articles.title: Immigrant rights groups sue to invalidate Trump administration's El Salvador prison deal
articles.description: A coalition of immigrant rights groups is suing to invalidate the Trump administration's deal to house detainees in a notorious prison in El Salvador.

articles.description: This almighty row has all the hallmarks of an ugly celebrity breakup, but has implications far beyond their billionaire clique.
articles.content:

articles.author: Sky News
articles.title: Serving coffee in America, under fear of death from the Taliban in Afghanistan
articles.description: "This 2025 version of Trump's 2017 'Muslim ban' turns the so-called American dream into a nightmare for millions around the globe," writes Sky's David Blevins.
articles.content:
At a coffee shop in northern Virginia, you'll find a taste of the Middle East.
But President Trump's travel ban has turned the stomachs of the owner and her staff.
Layla Atik is from Yemen, her employees are from Afghanistan and Eritrea, three of the... [2697 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Harvard foreign students in limbo as college challenges Trump’s ban
articles.description: Harvard University is challenging President Donald Trump’s move to block foreign students from coming to the United States to attend the Ivy League school, calling it illegal retaliation for Harvard’s rejection of White House demands.
articles.content: Winning admission to Harvard University fulfilled a longtime goal for Yonas Nuguse, a student in Ethiopia who endured a war in the country’s Tigray region, internet and phone shutdowns, and the COVID-19 pandemic — all of which made it impossible to f... [6391 chars]
